comments:
RC1:

- check out org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring form HEAD
- change compliance level to 5.0
- run infer type arguments

observe: you get the exception below.

The type signature which caused the exception looks like this:

<T:>Ljava.lang.Class;

We created the signature from a binding key which looks like this:

Ljava/lang/Class<TT;>;

using new BindingKey("Ljava/lang/Class<TT;>;").internalToSignature()

Assigning to JDT/Core first since I think this is a core problem.

Changed Signature#getTypeSignatureKind(String) and getTypeSignatureKind(char[])
to skip the type parameters definition.
Added regression tests SignatureTests#testGetTypeSignatureKind25() and
testGetTypeSignatureKindCharArray25().
Verified for 3.1 RC2 using build I20050610-0010
